snippet: An ambitious United States government project to strengthen medical education in sub-Saharan Africa is reporting broad progress.
abstract: Medical Education Partnership Initiative, ambitious United States government project to strengthen medical education in sub-Saharan Africa, is reporting broad progress in addressing continent’s critical shortages of physicians and health care workers.
lead_paragraph: An ambitious United States government project to strengthen medical education in sub-Saharan Africa is reporting broad progress.

headline.print_headline: Africa, With U.S. Help, Graduates More Doctors
headline.main: Africa, With U.S. Help, Graduates More Doctors
